Symfony2 design patterns @ symfonyday

Fix
Tweet
18 October 2013
  • symfony2 11
  • conference 2
  • design-patterns 1
  • talk 1

I had the good fortune of being able to speech for the second time in a row, on the Symfony-Day conference.

This time I had a quality partner mr @giorrrgio (Giorgio Cefaro), we talked about design patterns in Symfony2, and even about some Anti-patterns.

Design pattern symfony2 - Nanos gigantium humeris insidentes.
